typing: Turning Ideas into Powerful Java Applications Passionate Coder.
Writing Code, Building Solutions, Creating Impact.
home.para: I am a 2025 pass out student of Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering from JNTUA.

para: Hi there! I'm Sivaprasad, an undergraduate student with a passion for web development and technology. I've been immersing myself in the world of coding, crafting intuitive solutions and exploring the endless possibilities it offers.

As a budding web developer, I've ventured into the world of e-commerce by creating websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, I've developed projects like a dynamic React.js application designed to facilitate learning and practice in various fields.
I would like to do an internship on web development or fronend or backend(java).
